# Draft:Umeå Wrestling Battle

{Infobox wrestling competition
| name        = Umeå Wrestling Battle
| status      = active
| genre       = Wrestling tournament
| date        = October (week 41)
| frequency   = Annual
| location    = Umeå, Sweden
| first       = 2019
| organiser   = Umeå Brottning
| website     = [https://www.umeawrestlingbattle.se umeawrestlingbattle.se]
}
Umeå Wrestling Battle is an annual international wrestling tournament held in Umeå, Sweden, each October during week 41. The event features competition in Greco-Roman and women’s wrestling for all age groups, and freestyle wrestling for boys from the FS14 category and upwards. It is organised by Umeå Brottning.
History
The tournament developed from the event known as Norrländska Elitbrottningarna, a regional championship for wrestlers from northern Sweden. Umeå hosted Norrländska Elitbrottningarna in 2014, 2015, 2017 and 2018 (with the 2016 edition held in Härnösand).
In 2019 the competition was re-branded as Umeå Wrestling Battle to reflect its broader and more international scope. The new format attracted wrestlers from clubs across Sweden and neighbouring countries, with increased participation across multiple age and style categories.
Recent events
By 2024 the tournament reported a record number of registered entrants (694 from 97 clubs across 12 countries).
Official result files from RingerDB show the number of actual starters each year, illustrating steady growth of the event.
Results by year
* 2019 – 277 participants. [https://turniereklassisch.ringerdb.de/VT/2019/SE/191019_Umea/indexSWE.htm RingerDB]
* 2021 – 325 participants. [https://turniereklassisch.ringerdb.de/VT/2021/SE/211015_Umea/indexSWE.htm RingerDB]
* 2022 – 432 participants. [https://turniereklassisch.ringerdb.de/VT/2022/SE/221014_Umea/indexSWE.htm RingerDB]
* 2023 – 475 participants. [https://turniereklassisch.ringerdb.de/DM/2023/SE/231014_Umea/indexSWE.htm RingerDB]
* 2024 – 612 participants. [https://turniereklassisch.ringerdb.de/LM/2024/SE/241011_Umea/indexSWE.htm RingerDB]
* 2025 – 659 participants. [https://turniereklassisch.ringerdb.de/VT/2025/SE/251010_Umea/indexSWE.htm RingerDB]
Format
Umeå Wrestling Battle is typically held during mid-October (week 41). The competition includes Greco-Roman and women’s divisions for all ages, and freestyle divisions for boys from the FS14 category. Matches are conducted under the rules of the Swedish Wrestling Federation and United World Wrestling.
Organisation
The event is organised by Umeå Brottning, a wrestling club based in Umeå, in cooperation with the Swedish Wrestling Federation. Tournament information and results are published through platforms such as [https://www.ligadb.de LigaDB.de] and the official website.
External links
* [https://www.umeawrestlingbattle.se Official website]
* [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ySFA3egJ2jE Umeå Wrestling Battle 2025 Highlights (Video)]
* [https://www.ligadb.de LigaDB.de results database]
